summary: Canary deploy War Office clerk Alfas in HC with tight scopes and dry-run tasks.

directives.details: Install clerks under War Office; map roles to minimal allowlists and caps.
Run dry-run routines: draft briefings, queue ledger notes, propose doc edits (no direct writes outside allowlists).
Capture outputs and behaviors; watch tone/entropy; record incidents (if any).
Send to exchange/reports/inbox/order-2025-10-16-033-report.json with tasks executed, caps enforced, anomalies, next steps.
